data.zh: 下雪了
data.en: Snow

data.zh: 佩奇和乔治今天非常兴奋。
data.en: Peppa and George are very excited today.

data.zh: 因为外面下雪了！
data.en: It is snowing outside!

data.zh: 妈妈，我们可以去玩雪吗？
data.en: Mummy! Can we go and play in the snow?

data.zh: 可以，但是外面非常冷，所以你们必须穿暖和些。
data.en: Yes, but it's very cold outside, so you must wrap up warm.

data.zh: 好啊！
data.en: Hurray!

data.zh: 还有不要忘记戴上你们的帽子，围巾和手套。
data.en: And don't forget to wear your hats, and scarves and gloves.

data.zh: 外面天气非常冷。
data.en: It is very cold outside.

data.zh: 佩奇和乔治必须戴上他们的帽子围巾和手套。
data.en: Peppa and George must wear their hats and scarves and gloves.

data.zh: 快来，乔治！
data.en: Come on, George!

data.zh: 佩奇和乔治在雪地里踩脚印。
data.en: Peppa and George are making footprints in the snow.

data.zh: footprints in the snow!
data.en: Peppa and George love making

data.zh: 哦，糟糕！
data.en: Oh, dear！

data.zh: 这一点也不好笑！
data.en: It's not funny!

data.zh: 乔治，让我们来打雪仗吧！
data.en: George, let's play snowballs!

data.zh: 佩奇做了个雪球。
data.en: Peppa has made a snowball.

data.zh: 佩奇和乔治玩得很开心。
data.en: Peppa and George are having a lot of fun.

data.zh: 乔治，快回来，你这小猪！
data.en: George, come back, you little piggy!

data.zh: 哦，糟糕。也许这游戏玩得有点过火了。
data.en: Oh, dear. Maybe this game is getting a little too rough.

data.zh: 对不起，乔治。
data.en: Sorry, George.

data.zh: 乔治！让我们来堆雪人吧！
data.en: George! Let's build a snowman!

data.zh: 佩奇和乔治在堆雪人。
data.en: Peppa and George are making a snowman.

data.zh: 首先，他们堆了身体。
data.en: First, they make the body.

data.zh: 乔治，这是雪人的身体了。
data.en: George, this is the snowman's body.

data.zh: 现在，他们在堆雪人的头。
data.en: Now, they make the snowman's head.

data.zh: 现在，他需要胳膊，眼睛和嘴巴！
data.en: Now, he needs arms and eyes and a mouth!

data.zh: 乔治找了几根树枝来做雪人的胳膊。
data.en: George has found some sticks for the snowman's arms.

data.zh: 佩奇找了几块石头来做雪人的眼睛和嘴巴。
data.en: Peppa has found some stones for the snowman's eyes and mouth.

data.zh: 这是他的脸啦。
data.en: This is his face.

data.zh: 现在雪人需要一个鼻子。
data.en: Now the snowman needs a nose.

data.zh: 佩奇找了根胡萝卜来做雪人的鼻子。
data.en: Peppa has got a carrot, to make the snowman's nose.

data.zh: 雪人看上去很开心。
data.en: The snowman looks very happy.

data.zh: 但也许他有点冷。
data.en: But maybe he is bit cold.

data.zh: 雪人需要穿些衣服来保暖。
data.en: The snowman needs some clothes to keep him warm.

data.zh: 乔治找来了一些衣服来给雪人保暖！
data.en: George has found some clothes to keep the snowman nice and warm!

data.zh: 雪人戴上了他的帽子围巾和手套。
data.en: The snowman is wearing his hat and scarf and gloves.

data.zh: 妈妈！爸爸！快来看看！
data.en: Mummy! Daddy! Come and look!

data.zh: 妈妈戴着她的帽子，围巾和手套来了。
data.en: Mummy Pig is wearing her hat and scarf and gloves.

data.zh: 这是我见过的最好的雪人了！
data.en: That is the best snowman I have ever seen!

data.zh: 猪爸爸看上去有点冷。
data.en: Daddy Pig looks quite cold.

data.zh: 他没有戴着他的帽子，围巾和手套。
data.en: He isn't wearing his hat and scarf and gloves.

data.zh: 爸爸，你为什么不戴上你的帽子，围巾和手套？
data.en: Daddy, why aren't you wearing your hat and scarf and gloves?

data.zh: 我不知道他们跑哪去了！
data.en: I don't know where they are!

data.zh: 我到处都找不到它们。
data.en: I can't find them anywhere.

data.zh: 我想我知道爸爸的帽子，围巾和手套在哪了
data.en: I think I know where Daddy's hat, scarf and gloves are...

data.zh: 猪爸爸的帽子，围巾和手套都在雪人身上！
data.en: Daddy Pig's hat and scarf and gloves are on the snowman!
